about_the_game:
Note: Until July, this will be a constantly updated proof-of-concept demo. This demo does not reflect the final or Early Access versions of the game.

Get in. Get Loot. Get out.
Countless misguided souls have traveled to the forsaken Worlds that border reality and The Void. Some seek riches, others, long-lost arcane secrets, and for a few: heroic glory for the sake of mankind. No matter what it is that you seek - if you want to stay alive, always remember to Beware the Depths.

name: Beware the Depths Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU I5
  • Memory: 64 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
